name: Don Duality: Initiation
description:
Manage your restaurant

During the first 9 days of Don Duality, you'll have the chance to enhance and expand your restaurant. Purchase extra tables to seat more customers and advertise to increase your popularity and draw in a larger crowd. However, be aware that as your restaurant becomes more successful, you'll need to hire additional staff to keep up with the demand.



Lead a Mafia organization

Take control of your criminal empire in Don Duality by commanding your gangster subordinates to engage in a range of activities, including robbing banks, collecting debts, and intimidating law enforcement. Choose your missions carefully to maximize profits and establish your dominance in the underworld.



Watch for random events

Beware of marked cards with a bell. Each time you receive one, it adds to the bell's progress bar. When it's full, a significant event is triggered that can seriously impact your business



Launder your money

Consider money laundering daily. Wealth attracts police attention. Maxed out concern leads to arrest.
